attributes.additional_details: The devolved assemblies are a drain on the UK's finances and are a heavy burden for England to carry when the UK is fighting out of a recession.
attributes.background: Repeal the Devolution Bill and make the UK whole again

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the people of the devolved nations. You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333012
